      Methods in net.sf.jguiraffe.gui.app that return ApplicationContext 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected ApplicationContext Application.createApplicationContext()
      Creates and initializes the application context.
      ApplicationContext Application.getApplicationContext()
      Returns a reference to the actual application context.
